unnormalised: Hey folks! On pesticide usage... Remember the 1990s, when everyone in Punjab was going crazy with it? My nani always said, "Too much poison, beta!". Even now, I see farmers near my village, using stuff like crazy at 5:00 AM on 26/01/2023. Need better solutions, like the drip irrigation they use in Maharashtra, right? What about organic farming from the folks at the ICAR on 10/10/2024? Surely that is the way forward! Gotta protect our Bharat Mata!
